title: ISic000665. Private financing of a public building (?)
body:
Facsimile Images

[C(aius) Iulius] ((·)) C(aii) ((·)) f(ilius) ((·)) Loṇ[gus] duumvir [---]
[---g]ṛadu[s ---]
[---]cuṃ [---]

Apparatus criticus

Text according to Ampolo and Erdas (2019) L3 and AE 1991.898

English translation

Caius Iulius Longus, son of Caius, duumvir (?) [...] the stands/steps (?) [...].

Italian translation

Caius Iulius Longus, figlio di Caius, duumvir (?) [...] i gradinate/gradini (?) [...].

commentary
